item.title: The Easier Way to Create a Map of Norway Using {fhimaps}
item.description: Every now and then you discover a discover a much simpler solution to a problem you spent a lot of time solving. This recently happened to me on the topic of creating a map of Norway in R. In this post, I want to go through the process of what I learned. Previously, I used a JSON file and the {geojsonio} package to create a map of Norway and its fylker (counties) in particular.
